name: Astronomy and Astrophysics I
description: An introduction to the observational and computational techniques used in astronomy

name: Astronomy and Astrophysics II
description: A continuation of Astronomy and Astrophysics I with topics such as stellar structure and evolution, galaxies, and cosmology

name: High-Energy Astrophysics I
description: An introduction to high-energy astrophysics including black holes, neutron stars, gamma-ray bursts, and X-ray binaries

name: High-Energy Astrophysics II
description: A continuation of High-Energy Astrophysics I with topics such as high energy gamma-ray astronomy, cosmic rays, and particle acceleration
